item.title: What! So What! Now What!
item.description: Introduction Here’s some simple advice that, once said, makes so much sense that I wonder if it really needs saying. When you’re delivering a key message or report in a work environment, consider adopting the “What, So What, Now What” framework. Take, as an example, a demand review presentation when the Demand Manager presents the demand plan update. If you’re unfamiliar with the S&OP structure, the objective of the monthly demand review is to achieve consensus on sales plans and forecasts that are then published to the broader business.
